meaningMnemonic: Hey. <kanji>Drop</kanji> yourself down and <kanji>arrive</kanji> back to me. You're going nuts over there. Lower down. Come back. Arrive. You need to do these things <vocabulary>to calm down</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The readings come from 落ちる and 着く. Hopefully you know these words so you can read this word as well! If you don't, just 落ち着く and everything will be okay.
